text: EqvaM ~MviqdvAnaqgnimu#paqtiShTha#tE suvaqrgamEqva lOqkamE#tiq sarvaqmAyu#rEtyaqBi vA EqShO$&gnI A rO#hatiq ya E#nAvupaqtiShTha#tEq yathAq Kaluq vai SrEyA#naqByArU#DhaH kAqmaya#tEq tathA# karOtiq naktaqmupa# tiShThatEq na prAqtaH sa(gm) hi nakta#M ~MvraqtAni# sRuqjyantE# saqha SrEyA(gg)#Scaq pApI#yA(gg) ScAsAtEq jyOtiqrvA aqgnistamOq rAtriqrya - [  ] 40
